name: Saint Sigrid//The Second
description:
Half Saint series,
#II of XII

Captain of the Gatekeepers
Brave samaritan 
Lawful Bad

"Tempered by steel, blessed by Ragnar's undying flame
 The fabled White Shield stand unflinching on Ardveil Hinterland turned crimson
 Protector of our people, The bane of Galigos
 Above all, only Great Sigrid understands
 That a shield can also brand destruction
 And a hero will do anything when others found wanting"

[The Paragon of End Times, Chapter V]

1536x2048 144dpi
